name: Ceremonial Swearing-in Date Set for Newly Elected County Officials
description: Six newly elected officials will be sworn into office at 10 a.m. on Monday, Jan. 9 at the County Administration Center Board Chamber. The ceremony will be held in person and streamed virtually.

affiliation.name: County of San Diego Communications Office

articleContent:
Six newly elected officials will be sworn into office at 10 a.m. on Monday, Jan. 9 at the County Administration Center Board Chamber. The ceremony will be held in person and streamed virtually.
The ceremonial swearing-in is for Fourth District Supervisor Nathan Fletcher, Fifth District Supervisor Jim Desmond, Sheriff Kelly A. Martinez, District Attorney Summer Stephan, Assessor/Recorder/County Clerk Jordan Marks and Treasurer/Tax Collector Dan McAllister.
The terms of office formally began on Monday, Jan. 2, 2023, at 12 noon. Each official was administered the oath of office prior to the start of their respective terms. The swearing-in ceremony will be an opportunity to publicly state the oath of office and deliver brief remarks.
Due to limited seating, the public will be able to watch the ceremony in Room 302 across from the Chamber and in the observation balcony on the fourth floor. Seating in the Chamber will be limited to invited guests.
The Clerk of the Board urges members of the public to watch the ceremony virtually. The event will be broadcast live on:

Cable TV: Cox Ch. 24 (South) or Ch. 19 (North); Spectrum Ch. 24 or 85; AT&T Channel 99.
Online: The County will be broadcasting the meeting through a variety of services. Note that there may be a 45-second or more delay when viewing the broadcast online, depending on the service and your Internet connection.

Web Stream with Agenda
Vimeo Livestream
County YouTube Channel (Closed Captioning available through YouTube)
Facebook Live
Twitter


Via phone: Listen to the live ceremony by dialing (619) 531-4716. This is a live, listen-only feed.

For more information about watching the ceremony, visit the Clerk of the Board’s website.
